question: You are living in a University residence, and you have a problem with the high levels of noise from a new campus restaurant which is open until midnight.Write a letter to the governor of the University. In your letter,•	complain about the situation•	say why this is a problem•	and propose ways to reduce the noise
text: I am writing this letter regarding the amount of noise coming from the new restaurant which has just opened near my University residence.

Although I am pleased that we have this facility, the Friendship restaurant has been promoting parties every night until midnight and because of that, there is noise pollution such as loud music and conversations that I can hear in my room.

This unpleasant situation has caused a serious problem in my life  since I cannot concentrate to study or even sleep at a suitable time. As a result, in the morning I feel extremely tired affecting the progress of my studies.

I would like to suggest that the campus authorities restrict the restaurant’s opening to 9pm at the latest, on weekdays, leaving it at midnight during the Saturdays. I also would propose that we put up some signs reminding users to be considerate and to keep their noise to an absolute minimum. These simple steps would make me feel happy again.
Thank you for your attention to this important matter.
